definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Mom, I rode my bike without falling off.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，我可以稳稳当当地骑自行车了。

sentences.english: He was firmly seated among the highest boughs.
sentences.chinese: 他稳稳当当地坐在最高的树枝中间。

sentences.english: The baby loves being tossed up and safely caught.
sentences.chinese: 这小婴孩喜欢人家把他抛起来再稳稳当当地接住。

sentences.english: I’m resting comfortably now, thank you.
sentences.chinese: 我现在坐得很稳当，谢谢你。

sentences.english: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.
sentences.chinese: 求你用你的话，使我脚步稳当，不许什么罪孽辖制我。

sentences.english: Do not fear the helm, the boat secure.
sentences.chinese: 把舵的不慌，乘船的稳当。

sentences.english: Later, you dig a hole beneath the boulder and lift out a pair of Surefooted Boots.
sentences.chinese: 然后，你在那巨石下挖洞弄出了一双稳当之靴。

sentences.english: Soft black material on outer surface for comfort and a firm grip.
sentences.chinese: 黑色柔软外层，使用舒适，握持稳当。

sentences.english: Hardy and sure-footed animal smaller and with longer ears than the horse.
sentences.chinese: 强壮并迈步稳当的动物，比马身体小而耳朵长。

sentences.english: True and false of concave and convex jagged, secure, has the feeling of qingfen elegance.
sentences.chinese: 凹凸参差，真假稳当，有清芬高雅之感。

sentences.english: This chick was born not long ago, and is not even able to walk steadily.
sentences.chinese: 这只鸡雏刚出生没多久，走路还不稳当呢。

sentences.english: Knowledge derives from education and is a surer road to wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 知识源于教育，同时也是通往智能较稳当的一条路。

sentences.english: We were just bumming along nicely when the tyre burst.
sentences.chinese: 我们正稳稳当当驱车前进时，突然轮胎爆了。

definition: everything steady and stable (idiom); overcautious and unimaginary
firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
variant of 踏實|踏实[ta1 shi5]
steady as Mt Tai/as safe as houses
to entail strenuous effort/to toil at a task/strenuous/laborious/strain
to feet the feet perfectly/to follow closely/hard on sb's heels
